title: thefuikijs
author: thefuikijs
content: So I have been into crypto a while now. But I am the HODLer type lets say that, I have good amount of money invested and I just tend to read about news etc. But dont do it daily lets say that. So now I am trying to educate myself more and more crypto, and trying to learn a bit of spot trading. Now, that I have been learning more and more I see these groups or accounts which have a good community and offers a VIP program offering daily analytics, trading signals etc.So my question is...Are they a scam, and if not, are they worth it?For example I have been looking at this group = crypto.dreams on IG, has good amount of followers and account from 2016, which is positive I think... But its pretty expensive 250 dollars per month, which I am not prepared to spend just to find out if it is legit or a scam, so anyone has any experience with this group or any crypto trading groups?

comments.author: Grim_Fandango
comments.body: Those trading groups are most likely scam and I would advise you to stay away from them. If you want to learn how to trade you have to put some effort into it, read books and lose a lot of money while learning so in the end for majority of people it makes more sense to hold what you have.
